item.title: Clue scroll Help
item.dc:creator: @bburton31 bburton31
item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

For my deltasource I use

		server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(NPCID, X, Y, HEIGHTLEVEL);

I think the final is height level. lol. Incase you ask, I have no idea how to “delete” the NPC, the easiest way i found is to write a code to move it to X = 0 and Y = 0 when your done.

item.title: Clue scroll Help
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

if(c.absX == 3101 && c.absY == 3554 && c.playerHasItem(2858)){
c.deleteItem(2858, c.getItemSlot(2858), 1);
c.addItem(2830, 1);
c.sM(“You find a casket!”);

This is my code for the clue scroll but i need to make something that if you dig at that position that an NPC comes up if i dig there how do i make that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 18, 2009, 09:08:33 am[/size][hr]So if you dig that a npc apears no one know that?:S
